record.title: PROVIDING FOR A CONDITIONAL ADJOURNMENT OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the immediate consideration of H. Con. Res. 41, just received from the House and at the desk.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the concurrent resolution be agreed to, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, without any intervening action or debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
